column5: Gotta love the internet for finding pictures of the way things used to be...  Congrats on the New Place Fishmaster (Steve)  Where you are!  42° 53' 40" N / 079° 36' 00" W - [Dunnville/ON, CA] Distance 0 nm Betamik Harbour MarinaBETAMIK HARBOUR is located on the shores of the "HERITAGE" Grand River in the historic small town of Dunnville. BETAMIK HARBOUR is situated on 32 acres of waterfront property, only 2 miles from the mouth of the Grand River at Lake Erie. It is accessible by boat, automobile, float plane and by train transportation. Thought you may enjoy a few pics of the way things used to be at your new home      Cheers and good luck with all your plans  Jen
Hope everything goes according to plan, and without a hitch.
I think there's just enough docks there for an OFC get together! LOL

I missed something. Did Steve buy Manns Marina?  BTW Wayne, the docks are no longer there only the steel posts are, so he has his work cut out.  I'm surprised my brother's son-in-law didn't buy it, he's bought up a lot of good properties in Dunnville. If you did buy the place you beat him to it, congratulations!
Awesome! does this mean I don't have to drag all my crap from the gate now? I can just drive right on through? Free boat launching for OFC members?
Nice work Steve, gotta luv the potential the place has. I was wondering how long til you bought your fav fishin hole...lol.
Thanks OFNER's yes lots of work ahead but in fair time should be all good ...ok im off to bed ..

Hey Everyone,  Just wanted to let you know I am settled into the new place... If you would like directions they are in the announcements link...  Special thanks to Jen for all her help, as well as all of you that stopped in.  It was great seeing some old faces as well as meeting some of the awesome people from here.  We are open for business and FISHING>>> now we should all hope for ice.  FISHMASTER... Steve
No Thanks Needed... Congrats ...  Cheers  Jen
